name: Grow Up (itch) (Best2dGamesStudio)
description:
On a distant planet, where life is just beginning arise, started life a lonely flower.

He was unlucky to be born, like his other brothers and sisters, under the warm rays of the sun (possible). The dark cave became his home, full of mysteries and dangers.

Help the flower will survive and grow up.

Are you ready?

Use arrows or A+D to play.
